name: E-commerce Website
description: A Laravel 11 and Vue 3 e-commerce website.
role: Full-stack Developer - Responsible for building the back-end with Laravel, integrating it with Vue.js for dynamic UI, and ensuring proper database management.

name: Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio showcasing projects, skills, and experience, built with Vue.js and TailwindCSS.
role: Front-end Developer - Built a responsive portfolio with Vue.js and TailwindCSS, ensuring a smooth user experience and fast performance.

name: TechLab Pro
description: A mobile application designed for biomedical laboratory technicians, students, and residents to manage techniques, reagents, and interactive learning.
role: Project Manager & Lead Developer - Oversaw project development, working on both the front-end and back-end aspects, integrating features such as timers, reagent management, and interactive learning tools.

name: Gestion d'Absence
description: An application designed to help teachers easily track and manage student absenteeism, ensuring accurate and quick records.
role: Full-stack Developer - Built the back-end with Laravel and integrated it with Vue.js for a user-friendly experience.

name: Blog Project
description: A simple blog platform where users can create, edit, and comment on posts.
role: Full-stack Developer - Designed and developed the blog's back-end with Laravel and created a dynamic front-end with Vue.js.

name: To-Do List
description: A simple task management app to keep track of daily tasks.
role: Front-end Developer - Developed the entire front-end with Vue.js and integrated it with Firebase for real-time updates.
